meanings.definition: A type of cabbage with crinkled leaves.
meanings.sent1: I made a delicious salad with fresh savoys from the garden.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a sale on savoys, so I bought some to cook for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit snuck into the garden and nibbled on the savoys, thinking they were a fun snack.
meanings.sent4: The savoys in the field danced in the breeze, their crinkled leaves shimmering in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The chef's secret to a perfect coleslaw was using savoys for their unique texture and flavor.

meanings.definition: A type of lettuce with curly leaves.
meanings.sent1: The sandwich was extra crunchy thanks to the fresh savoys inside.
meanings.sent2: I prefer using savoys in my salads because of their interesting texture.
meanings.sent3: The picky eater refused to try the salad with savoys, claiming the curly leaves looked too fancy.
meanings.sent4: The savoys in the garden stood out like a crown of green curls among the other vegetables.
meanings.sent5: The chef's signature dish included a bed of savoys, adding a delightful crunch to every bite.
